languages.text: {n}Беженцы быстро осознали, что им не найти приюта в ульях, и рассеялись по пустошам. Суровый урок дисциплины был преподан столичному миру.{/n}
{n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Беженцы быстро осознали, что им не найти приюта в ульях, и рассеялись по пустошам. Суровый урок дисциплины был преподан столичному миру.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they will not find shelter in the hives, and dispersed across the wastelands. They have taught a harsh lesson in discipline to the capital.{/n}
{n}The refugees quickly realised that they will not find shelter in the hives, and dispersed across the wastelands. They have taught a harsh lesson in discipline to the capital.{/n}
{n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

{n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

languages.text: {n}难民们很快意识到他们在巢都里找不到避难所，于是他们四散到废土上。首都迎来了一场对于纪律的严苛考验。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}难民们很快意识到他们在巢都里找不到避难所，于是他们四散到废土上。首都迎来了一场对于纪律的严苛考验。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los refugiados se dieron cuenta rápidamente de que no encontrarían refugio en las colmenas y se dispersaron por los páramos. Una dura lección de disciplina ha llegado a la capital.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los refugiados se dieron cuenta rápidamente de que no encontrarían refugio en las colmenas y se dispersaron por los páramos. Una dura lección de disciplina ha llegado a la capital.{/n}

languages.text: {n}難民たちはすぐに、ハイヴには避難する場所がないことを悟り、ウエストランドへと散っていった。首都では、規律面での厳しい教訓を学ばねばならなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}難民たちはすぐに、ハイヴには避難する場所がないことを悟り、ウエストランドへと散っていった。首都では、規律面での厳しい教訓を学ばねばならなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les réfugiés, réalisant rapidement qu'ils ne trouveraient ni abri ni refuge dans les ruches, se sont dispersés dans les terres désolées. C'est une leçon de discipline bien difficile à digérer qui a ainsi été infligée à la capitale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les réfugiés, réalisant rapidement qu'ils ne trouveraient ni abri ni refuge dans les ruches, se sont dispersés dans les terres désolées. C'est une leçon de discipline bien difficile à digérer qui a ainsi été infligée à la capitale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge erkannten schnell, dass sie in den Makropolen keine Zuflucht finden würden, und zerstreuten sich im Ödland. Die Hauptstadt hat eine harte Lektion in Sachen Disziplin gelernt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge erkannten schnell, dass sie in den Makropolen keine Zuflucht finden würden, und zerstreuten sich im Ödland. Die Hauptstadt hat eine harte Lektion in Sachen Disziplin gelernt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mülteciler, kovanlarda sığınak bulamayacaklarının çarçabuk farkına vararak çorak toprakların dört bir yanına dağıldı. Başkente disiplin konusunda sert bir ders verildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees quickly realised that they would not find shelter in the hives and dispersed across the wastelands. A harsh lesson in discipline has been delivered to the capital.{/n}
